titles.title: Hymn 65 - Come While Christ Is Calling

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines:
Calling now, calling now,
Hear the Saviour calling now;
Calling now, calling now,
Hear the Saviour calling now.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come, oh come,
while Christ is pleading,
Oh, what love His tones convey!
Will you slight His proffered mercy?
Will you longer from Him stray?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
